amy.name: Amy
amy.title: The Sand Warrior
amy.desc: Amy fights crime in the desert with her mighty powers to control the sand.

prop.Active: Amy dashes forward gaining movement speed and deals physical damage to anyone in her path.
Amy creates an area with quicksand, reducing enemy movement speed.
Amy spins around with her staff, dealing physical damage to enemies.
Amy creates a sandstorm which blinds nearby enemies, dealing physical damage.

calida.name: Calida
calida.title: The Fire Mistress
calida.desc: Legend says Calida learned her fire powers from a dragon she keeps in her parents castle.

prop.Passive: Anyone who attacks Calida instantly combusts.

prop.Active: Calida throws a ball of fire, dealing magic damage to all enemies in it's path.
Calida creates a circle of fire around her, dealing magic damage to enemies.
Calida creates a big tornado of fire that throws any enemies away in it's path, dealing magic damage.

gerty.name: Gerty
gerty.title: The Griffin Rider
gerty.desc: Gerty was brought up by a flock of griffins, now she fights for justice with her bow.

prop.Active: Gerty launches an arrow that pierces through enemies.
Gerty's griffin screams to increases her and her allies strength.
Gerty sends her griffin to attack an enemy, dealing physical damage.
Gerty rides her griffin in the air for a short duration, letting her escape enemies.

grooth.name: Grooth
grooth.title: The Monster
grooth.desc: A mythical beast from the dark forest, he never talks about his past.

prop.Active: Grooth eats a minion, healing him and increasing his physical power.
Grooth travels underground and becomes invisible for enemies until he attacks.
Grooth leaps to a target, dealing physical damage to all enemies around him.
Grooth trips all enemies around him with his roots, stunning them for 2 seconds.

kronk.name: Kronk
kronk.title: The Dumb Barbarian
kronk.desc: Kronk is to dumb to feel pain and always solves his problems with violence.

prop.Active: Kronk swings his axe, dealing bleeding and physical damage.
Kronk screams, increasing you and your allies physical power and protection for a short amount of time.
Kronk screams and decreases enemy physical power and protection for a short amount of time.
Kronk screams and will not die for 10 seconds.

maya.name: Maya
maya.title: The Forest Girl
maya.desc: Maya lives by herself in the wild forest where she acquired the power to manipulate nature's energy.

prop.Active: Maya sends tree roots in a line, dealing physical damage.
Maya creates a healing field, healing herself and allies slowly.
Maya digs a hole and covers it with leaves, stunning enemies who walks on it.
Maya creates a large protective shield around her, blocking all projectiles.

mikael.name: Mikael
mikael.title: The Pirate
mikael.desc: Mikael has traveled all over the world and found the fountain of youth.

prop.Active: Mikeal shoots his gun, piercing through enemies. dealing physical damage.
Mikeal shouts, increasing his and his allies movement speed and attack speed for a short amount of time.
Mikeal throws four swords in all four directions, dealing physical damage.
Mikeal drinks water from the fountain of youth, resurrecting himself.

nina.name: Nina
nina.title: The Cold Ninja
nina.desc: Nina saw her parents die in front of her when she was a kid and now kills for the gold.

prop.Active: Nina vaults to and strikes with her blades, dealing physical damage.
Nina throw blades, dealing physical damage and reduced movement speed.
Nina creates a thick fog around her which makes her invisible to enemies.
Nina strikes all enemies nearby her in a flash, dealing physical damage.
